CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="AE_SB",HYPERLINK("/"&Id,'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ AE_SB__r.Name), IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="mp_AE_SB_Accommodation", HYPERLINK("/"&Id,'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ AE_SB_Accommodation__r.Name), IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="Airline_Upgrade",HYPERLINK("/"&Id,'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ Airline_Upgrade__r.Name), IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="Land_Activity",HYPERLINK("/"&Id,'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ land_activity__r.Name), IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="SubStopover",HYPERLINK("/"&Id,'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ Sub_Stopover__r.Name), IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="Insurance",HYPERLINK("/"&Id,'AddOn '+ Name +' '+ RecordType.Name),null) ) ) ) ))
CustomField.label: AddOn Name
